title: Calories in the Whopper
meta_description: Discover calories in the Whopper from Burger King, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for your meal planning.
assumptions: Standard Burger King Whopper: flame-grilled beef patty, sesame bun, lettuce, tomatoes, pickles, onions, mayo, ketchup; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, customizations, and serving size. Check Burger King app or packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One standard Whopper provides about 670 kcal, with 28 g protein and 51 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in the Whopper?
faqs.a: A standard Whopper has approximately 670 calories.

faqs.q: What is the protein in a Whopper?
faqs.a: About 28 grams of protein per Whopper.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in the Whopper?
faqs.a: Yes, around 51 grams of carbs, mostly from the bun.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in the Whopper?
faqs.a: Roughly 980 mg of sodium per serving.

faqs.q: Does the Whopper have trans fat?
faqs.a: It contains about 1 gram of trans fat from the beef patty.
